title: Suspension Lifted?
body:
Years ago my account was permanently suspended for player behavior issues. Here is the only chat log to my knowledge that has resulted in my account being perma banned. 

Game 1
In-Game
kîll mê: ad
kîll mê: idk
kîll mê: et her
kîll mê: wtf
kîll mê: noob
kîll mê: trash
kîll mê: why singed
kîll mê: report trist griefing
kîll mê: this trist
kîll mê: is so fucking dumb
kîll mê: i thought you muted me
kîll mê: you said you did
kîll mê: i guess you mean syndra since she's the only one who fed more than you?
kîll mê: god this trist is worthless tho
kîll mê: we have no adc
kîll mê: or mid
kîll mê: no damage
kîll mê: no trist
kîll mê: you are bad
kîll mê: me apparently
kîll mê: i have more wins than you have brain cells trist

Yeah, I was not very nice and I did not follow the summoner's code. I verbally abused another player and griefed my team. I deserved the ban and it has been upheld for a few years now. This kind of behavior is toxic and abusive towards other players and I know better than to behave like that. RIOT: If you uplift the permaban on my account it would mean a lot to me to be able to play on this account again with a reformed attitude.

replies.body: Permanent is forever. You won't be getting that account back. You can make a new one but that's about it.
You can't always get what you want.
But if you try sometimes, you get what you neeeeeeeeeeed!
He got what he needed - a permanent ban lol.
Permanent bans are never lifted. Its permanent, which means forever. I'm sorry but you were given warning before hand
Yes, really. Disappearing for a few years is not proof that you've reformed. Make a new account.
Lol that tells me right there you haven't reformed with that edgy comment. I'm not the one banned :D

This is when you create a new account.
Think of it as a dead goldfish. Because you're not getting this one back.
Contact support, I've seen them reverse permabans after a few years, but basically, you're on a very short leash, 1 slip and you're toast. If they agree, I suggest turning off chat, forever.
They dont reverse permbans unless it was in error.
this one was an error. they clearly made a mistake. shouldn't have been a perma :)

How was it a mistake. You flamed your teammates hard. You even admitted it in your original post

"I verbally abused another player and griefed my team. I deserved the ban and it has been upheld for a few years now."

Ain't gonna hapen
Riot never unbans perma bans if the ban was justified
